short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The contrast checker shows a heatmap of the contrast ratio between the middle and surrounding pixels.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The contrast checker shows a heatmap of the contrast ratio between the middle and surrounding pixels. The contrast setting can be changed in the extension options. Press Alt+Z (Ctrl+Z on MAC) or click on it's icon to start the extension.
